About

Description

He Weifang is a Chinese legal scholar and a former professor at Peking University. He has advocated for the reform of China's judicial system, and has argued that the Chinese Communist Party is an unregistered and therefore an illegal organization in China. Wikipedia
Born: 1960 (age 64 years), Muping District, Yantai, China
Education: Southwest University of Political Science & Law
